Class LinkUI

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class LinkUI
extends LineUI
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

The UI class for the UILink Component

Author:
Mohammed Sajid Ali / Michelle Bachler

recalculateCaretRectangle

private void recalculateCaretRectangle(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                       java.awt.FontMetrics fm,
                                       int maxWidth,
                                       boolean isUp)
A helper method for the paint method. Calulate the caretRectangle position when it is moving up or down a row.

Parameters:
g, - the current Graphics context.
fm, - the font metrics to use.
maxWidth, - the maximum width for the node.
isUp, - is the caret moving up a row? True equals up a row, false equals down a row.

setCaretRectangle

private void setCaretRectangle(java.awt.Graphics g,
                               java.awt.FontMetrics fm,
                               java.awt.Rectangle textR,
                               java.lang.String text,
                               int caretIndex,
                               int maxWidth)
A helper method for the paint method. Calulate and set the caretRectangle.

Parameters:
g, - the current Graphics context.
fm, - the font metrics to use.
textR, - the rectangle of the current text area of this label row.
text, - the row of text being addressed.
caretIndex, - the current position of the caret in this row.
maxWidth, - the maximum width for the node.
isUp, - is the caret moving up a row? True equals up a row, false equals down a row.

drawText

private void drawText(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      java.awt.FontMetrics fm,
                      UILink link,
                      java.lang.String text,
                      java.awt.Rectangle textR,
                      int maxWidth,
                      int startPos)
A helper method for the paint method. Paint a row of text.

Parameters:
g, - the current Graphics context.
fm, - the font metrics to use.
link - com.compendium.ui.UILink, the current link being painted.
text, - the row of text being painted.
textR, - the rectangle of the current text area of this label row.
caretIndex, - the current position of the caret in this row.
maxWidth, - the maximum width for the link.
startPos, - the starting position of this row in the context of the while label.
isUp, - is the caret moving up a row? True equals up a row, false equals down a row.

refreshBounds

public void refreshBounds()
Refresh the bounds of this object. Calls getPreferredSize, which is important for the paint method to work correctly later.#
